loadYamlUrl

{% raw %}

loadYamlUrl[source]

loadYamlUrl(url:str, headers:dict={}, loader=FullLoader)

load yaml from url as a dictionary for example: testUrl = 'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/thanakijwanavit/villaMasterSchema/dev/coupon/testData/buyXGetY.yaml' loadYamlUrl(testUrl) input: url:str: url of the file headers:Optional[dict]:headers loader:yaml.Loader: optional yaml loader default is yaml.FullLoader response: dict: yaml load of the file

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
testUrl = 'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/thanakijwanavit/villaMasterSchema/dev/coupon/testData/buyXGetY.yaml'
loadYamlUrl(testUrl)

{'couponId': 19,
 'couponName': 'Buy 3 Get 1 Free',
 'couponDescription': 'buy 3 items Get 1 free',
 'active': False,
 'couponCodeType': 'no_code',
 'startDate': 1617753600,
 'endDate': 1649289600,
 'actions': {'discountType': 'buy_x_get_y',
  'discountAmount': 1,
  'discountQtyStep': 3,
  'freeShipping': False,
  'conditions': {'conditionType': 'Product/Combine',
   'attribute': None,
   'operator': None,
   'value': True,
   'is_value_processed': None,
   'aggregator': 'all',
   'conditions': [{'type': 'Product',
     'attribute': 'promotion_matching',
     'operator': '==',
     'value': 'Buy3Get1',
     'is_value_processed': False}]}},
 'customers': [123, 1234],
 'branches': ['1000', '1001']}
